description.value: Your weapons have greater power available to them. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Brilliant], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Corrosive], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Flaming], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Frost], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Holy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Shock], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Thundering], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Unholy] to the list of property runes you can add to your weapon during your daily preparations.
